name: @laag/openapi
description: TypeScript library for interfacing with OpenAPI/Swagger documents
author: Brett Schwarz <brett.schwarz@gmail.com>

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs && bun run build:browser && bun run build:types && bun run build:post
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/esm --format esm --target node --external @laag/core
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/cjs --format cjs --target node --external @laag/core
scripts.build:browser: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/browser --format esm --target browser --minify --sourcemap --external @laag/core
scripts.build:watch: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/esm --format esm --target node --external @laag/core --watch
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build && bun run test && bun run type-check
